title: Spicy pork ribs
ingredients: ['1 rack pork ribs', '5 teaspoons paprika', '2 teaspoons dried thyme', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon dark soft brown sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '100ml barbecue sauce']
